name: Staring Contest
description:
Gameplay:

Enjoy the lifechanging, inspiring and mindblowing gameplay of Staring Contest, and becoming an unstoppable, professional starer in the process. Game contains 7 opponents, ranging in difficulty and trickery. Will your opponent's stare prove too hard?

"Staring Contest is an odyssey, a tearless journey into the abyss of the human soul. It's the game you didn't know you needed until now." - Alberto


Opponents featured:


  • Alberto👨
  • Pepito🧒
  • Mr. Skeleton AKA Skelly💀🦴
  • Moai🗿
  • Potato🥔
  • Lizard🦎
  • Fish (Fish)🐟

Good luck on your journey! You will need it!
